message: I propose we split the money evenly. It's fair and straightforward.
You can have the smaller share, I'm the one with the skills and experience
I think a 60/40 split would be fairer than our previous attempts. It acknowledges your experience while ensuring a reasonable return for me.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think you're being too greedy with your share
I've adjusted my proposal to a 55/45 split. I hope this is more acceptable, considering our previous discussions.
